job.title: Senior Software Engineer Android
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrbrustrongWhat youll dobrbrAs a Senior Software Engineer youll spend your days translating requirements into solutions writing code collaborating with crossfunctional teams and providing us with the insights necessary to think beyond the status quo Youll oversee small project teams consisting of other engineers who will look to you as a trusted advisor a subject matter expert who provides guidance and the right tools to get the job done You will have an opportunity to design and develop new innovative and security features for Walmart Account amp identity platform You will be responsible build the android app modules components You will also work closely with Product Owners UIUX and other senior engineering team members to define the future architecture and system design to support new business needsbrbrstronguAbout YoubrbrustrongYou have and can implement big ideas with a positive attitude You want to be a part of the team to disrupt this industry and you have these main skillsbrulliDemonstrate a strong understanding of the Android framework and respective component lifecycles liliDemonstrate a strong working knowledge of multithreading networking offline storage and performance tuningliliUnderstand product requirements develop and deploy the software applicationliliImplement performant code using Kotlin and JavaliliExperience using the stateoftheart Android libraries Android X Retrofit etcliliExperience in good app architecture using design patterns such as MVVM MVP or CleanliliExperience working with external data sources and APIsliliA disciplined approach to development code review testing documentation and code structure in a team environmentliliDevelop components and modules that add to the pool of reusable and platform capabilities for other application teams to leverageliliWrite unit test cases to achieve at least 80 code coverage for effective early errors detectionliliAdd application logging monitoring and alerting capabilities to help with operational needs of the application production environment liliAnalyze and troubleshoot production issues including careful log data analysis and turn around fixes quickly to minimize user impactliliParticipate in the team codereviewing process to receive and provide constructive feedback to raise the bar of code before being deployedliliA constant desire to improve learn more and take things to the next levelbrliulYoull really wow us ifbrbrYour ability to rise above group think and see beyond the here and now is matched only by your intellectual curiositybrulliYou come to the table with a comprehensive knowledge of Android Kotlin Java as well as Agile methodologiesliliYou consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an everchanging environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertiseliliYou level up when you have the opportunity to teach others and empower those around you to excelliliYou strongly believe in automation including code testing code not just unit but automated testingliliYou are a practitioner of secure coding patterns and advocate the same across your peersbrliulYoull make an impact bybrulliEffectively translating requirements into project parameters while working with agility from cradle to graveliliHelping crossfunctional teams to solve for business problems and develop solutions that enable us to redefine a bestinclass customer experienceliliEncouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insightdriven outcomes brliulstronguSkill Set AdditionsbrustrongulliThorough understanding and coding experience using Android SDK and Jetpack componentsliliIndepth knowledge of Android activities fragments navigation lifecycles view models multi layout design styles amp themes custom views data binding webviews app bundles accessibility multithreading build flavors GradleliliExpertise in Kotlin and JavaliliExperience in developing via Android Studio editorliliExperience in integrating RESTful and GraphQL Apis using RetrofitliliKnowledge of MVVM and Clean architectureliliAbility to design reusable componentsliliKnowledge of optimizations with limited battery life amp storageliliUnitintegrationUI testing using JUnit Expresso Robolectric MockkliliStrong debugging skills via Android debugger and network tools like CharlesliliQuick adaptability to new Android versionsbrliulstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongBachelor of Science and 5 years experience in software engineering OR Master of Science 2 years experience in software engineeringbrbrstronguPreferred QualificationsbrbrustrongMasters degree in Computer Science or related field and 2 years experience in software engineering or related fieldbrbrTechnology Powering the next retail disruptionbrbrImagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech Were a team of 15000 software engineers data scientists and service professionals within Walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 22 million associatesbrbrTo others innovation looks like an app service or some code  but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations emBeing human led is our true disruptionbrbremEcomRetailbrbrWalmart is the worlds largest retailer and Fortune 1 company In fact theres a store within 10 miles of most Americans Each week Walmart is counted on by 265 million customers weekly to provide groceries and essentials while introducing them to new products services and brands to help them save money and live betterbrbrSustainable GrowthbrbrOmnichannel merchants take a 360degree view on what is needed to drive sustainable growth both online and in stores It comes down to creating a seamless experience for our customers whether they are shopping online or in storesbrbrDynamic CenterbrbrWalmarts assortment covers home goods grocery apparel beauty electronics and so much more Our Merchandising associates driven by passion use market data and analytics risk taking efficiency and innovation to form the dynamic center from which it all beginsbrbrDiversity and InclusionbrbrThe Global Office of Culture Diversity Equity amp Inclusions CDEI mission is to create a culture where all associates feel included and are engaged to deliver on our purpose of saving people money so they can live better Hear more about this focus from Ben Hasan Senior Vice President and Global Chief Culture Diversity Equity amp Inclusion Officer and view the full 2020 Culture Diversity Equity amp Inclusion Report herebrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememBachelors degree in Computer Science and 3 years experience in software engineering or related field OR 5 years experience in softwarebrbrstronguEngineering Or Related Field Preferred QualificationsbrbrustrongememOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications brbrememMasters degree in Computer Science or related field and 2 years experience in software engineering or related field Primary Location840 W CALIFORNIA AVE SUNNYVALE CA 940864828 United States of America
